Plot: Set in 1990s Belfast, an active member of the IRA becomes an informant for MI5 in order to protect her son's welfare.
Title: Shadow Dancer
Writer: Tom Bradby (screenplay), Tom Bradby (based on the novel by)
Actors: Barry Barnes, Maria Laird, Ben Smyth, Brid Brennan
tomatoConsensus: A tense, thought-provoking thriller, Shadow Dancer is bolstered by sensitive direction from James Marsh and a terrific performance from Andrea Riseborough.
